text: walyastaʿfifi alladhina la yajiduna nikahan hatta yugh'niyahumu l-lahu min fadlihi wa-alladhina yabtaghuna l-kitaba mimma malakat aymanukum fakatibuhum in ʿalim'tum fihim khayran waatuhum min mali l-lahi alladhi atakum wala tuk'rihu fatayatikum ʿala l-bighai in aradna tahassunan litabtaghu ʿarada l-hayati l-dun'ya waman yuk'rihhunna fa-inna l-laha min baʿdi ik'rahihinna ghafurun rahimun
